merpi_desc: %USER's short little front legs. As if thru magic they somehow reach all the way to the ground. You could reach them too and...

merpi_normal: %USER is trying to send %TARGET's %T_PART to hell with a scissor squeeze!!
merpi_flowery: %USER is trying to send %TARGET's %T_PART to hell with a scissor squeeze!!

merpi_normal: %USER gently caresses %TARGET's %T_PART with their short front legs.
merpi_flowery: %USER gently caresses %TARGET's %T_PART with their short front legs.
merpi_repeat: %USER caresses %TARGET's %T_PART with their short front legs!

merpi_flowery: %USER lovingly caresses their short front legs with %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_flowery: %USER rubs their short front legs against %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_repeat: %USER rubs their short front legs against %TARGET's %T_PART.
